name: Raunak
body: Nikita Mam cleared all my doubts; her experience and thorough analysis helped me gain insight into what needs to be done next to build my future in the field of quantitative finance.

name: Cyric Kodath
body: Highly recommend. The founders are extremely knowledgeable in the field with a passion for excellence. A rare combination.

name: Lakshya
body: I was looking for Quant dev role and they were able to give me a lot of good guidance on what needs to be done and focused on. They all were pretty helpful in helping me narrow the direction that I need to get into.

name: Tai
body: Nikita and the team at Quant Insiders are the real deal. They provided me with a list of breadcrumbs to navigate the interview process for a Quant role.

name: Anomymous
body: Somdip covered the Stochastic vol model and local vol model in very detailed manner and made it look so simple

name: Jithendra Macha
body: Hi, I spoke to Tribhuvan. It was a productive conversation and very insightful. He provided a career advice and the steps to reach the destination in a simpler way and shared the resources to reach the same.

name: Arshdeep Sandhu
body: Nikita came up with a clear plan with solid mini objectives to push me on this new learning path!

name: Lakshya
body: I was looking for Quant dev role and they were able to give me a lot of good guidance on what needs to be done and focused on. They all were pretty helpful in helping me narrow the direction that I need to get into.
